requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 @2.9 GHz or AMD equivalent / Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970 or AMD equivalent / Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 115 MB available space
